definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: The hard cover is on sale for the same price as the paperback this week in the bookshop.
sentences.chinese: 在书店，这些精装本与平装本价格相同。

sentences.english: I have plenty of the paper-back in stock.
sentences.chinese: 我现已大量平装本的库存。

sentences.english: Persky tossed in a paperback copy of Flaubert's novel.
sentences.chinese: 帕斯基把福楼拜那本小说的平装本扔了进去。

sentences.english: Most of the sales have been of the paperback edition of the book.
sentences.chinese: 这本书的大部分销量贡献来自于它的平装本。

sentences.english: I've ordered the paperback edition of the dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 我已订购了这本词典的平装本。

sentences.english: I can tell by the look on your face that I'm going to have to write an afterword to the paperback.
sentences.chinese: 我可以看着你的脸告诉你，我会为平装本写一篇后记。

sentences.english: New copies of the paperback edition will come out in August.
sentences.chinese: 新版平装本将于今年8月面世。

sentences.english: The original model's e-ink screen measured 6 inches diagonally, roughly equivalent to a typical paperback.
sentences.chinese: 旧版的电子墨水屏幕6寸，约为一般平装本书的大小。

definition: binding and layout (of a book etc)
the amount of books etc printed at one impression/print run
dust jacket (of a book)/protective cover/document seal
book format, similar to in-4°, in-8° etc (a 16-kai format 16開|16开[shi2 liu4 kai1] is roughly A4)/abbr. to 開|开[kai1]
printing plate/printed version (of a digital publication)/printing (as in "1st printing" etc)
